item.title: EDA on Bangladesh Groundwater Arsenic Part 2
item.description: We have perfrom initial EDA on arsenic level in the early post. From the plots in part 1 The region being chosen there doesnâ€™t seem to be much spatial correlation It is hard to interpret this in longitude and latitude In this post, R code for simple data transformation and technique use in part 1 will NOT be shown again, we just present the result. Code for new technique will be included.
